about_the_game:
Find balance and harmony with your car as you battle at the legendary Fuji International Speedway in the latest GRID™ Legends premium content pack – Enduring Spirit*. Claim your right as the victor at the inaugural Seneca ‘GRID of Legends’ tournament. Have you got the spirit to see you through to the top spot?

Race alongside Yume Tanaka as Lara Carvalho with Seneca, for the first GRID of Legends tournament featuring the iconic Fuji International Speedway. With a brand new Endurance mode, four cars, eight story events, and 3 Career events to complete, you will need to be at one with the car to claim victory in the foothills of Mount Fuji.

Those with the GRID Legends: Deluxe Edition of GRID Legends get instant access to Enduring Spirit. Deluxe Edition players can invite friends to play the pack’s content for free**. Additionally, Enduring Spirit can be purchased separately.

Here’s everything that’s included:
• 4 new Vehicles
• 4 new layout variants at the stunning Fuji Speedway
• 8 new themed Story Experiences
• 3 new Career Events
• 2 existing routes with added Ramps & 1 existing route with added boost gates
• 1 new Multi-Class Endurance Racing Mode
• + new Liveries, Icons and Banners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i3 2130, AMD FX4300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950, AMD RADEON RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 8600k, AMD Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080, AMD RX590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
